arts.ttl: Barrow make it four wins from six matches to keep pace with leaders
arts.sum: Sam Foley and Theo Vassell were on target for the Cumbrians.

arts.ttl: Paid more to LOSE?! League Two minnows Barrow offer their players a bonus FOUR TIMES bigger if they're defeated at Chelsea than if they win in Carabao Cup... and it DOESN'T break the rules! NEW
arts.sum: The League two side travel to Stamford Bridge in the third round of the competition on September 24 and will seek to shock an upset against the Blues.
